attributes.action: Issuing all police officers with a firearm (hand gun) to ensure their safety
attributes.additional_details:
There has been a massive increase in knife crime, violent assault towards the UK public & police officers. Offenders are routinely carrying weapons to harm the public and police officers. There has been a increase in police officers killed on duty by offenders.
If police officers were to routinely carry sidearms this would create a deterrent & offenders would be less likely to carry weapons in public, there will be decreased assaults towards police & increased safety for the members of public.
attributes.background: Due to the increased violence towards the members of the community and UK police force, it should now be mandatory that all front line police officers should carry a Sidearm (hand gun) to ensure the safety of the public.
